The Light of Truth [School of Liveable Christianity] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Light of Truth (School of Liveable Christianity) Summary:   From Pat Deveney's database: Light of Truth, The. Monthly Bulletin of the School of Liveable Christianity. Promoting Principles of Life and Government. If thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light 1920-1958? Monthly Chicago, IL. Publisher: Light of Truth Publishing Co.. Editor: Ida Mingle. 1/1, July 1920. 8 pp. Sent in exchange for a "free-will offering." This was the bulletin of Mingle’s School of Liveable Christianity, with announcements of classes and outlines of readings and lessons for the faithful. Yale University; Duke University; Wisconsin Historical Society. Issues:Light of Truth Mar 1937 Light of Truth Mar 1957 (reprint of Nov 1931 issue) Light of Truth May 1957 Light of Truth Jul 1957 (reprint of Jul 1932 issue)
